roleset.name: lack substance, meaning; useless
roleset.note: MEANINGLESS-J NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to useless.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from meaningless.01-j)

role.descr: purpose for which arg 1 is useless

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: All the previous purchases are meaningless.

example.name: sad
example.text: I have made a meaningless life for myself.
